name: automatisch
tagline: A workflow automation platform for connecting applications with triggers and actions
description: Automatisch is an open-source alternative to Zapier for creating automated workflows between apps. It features a visual editor, triggers, filters, and supports webhook integrations for internal and third-party services.

features.title: Integration Automation Platform
features.description: Connect applications and automate repetitive workflows

features.title: Trigger and Action Builder
features.description: Define automation logic using triggers and actions

features.title: Service Integrations
features.description: Integrate with popular SaaS and internal tools

features.title: Workflow History
features.description: View logs and execution history for automations

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the automation platform on your infrastructure
